creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist
description: very large sheet of white fabric with oversized kanji for "love" painted and splattered in black ink mixed with gold dust; signature at L with red relief stamp; splatters throughout and shadowy footprints along bottom, and a sweeping footprint at LR
inscription:
Signature and Seal

See notes for translation
medium: Ink and gold dust on cotton
title: Love
